from:  https://googlesheets4.tidyverse.org/

practice creating a google sheet

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
```



```
{r}
(ss <- gs4_create("fluffy-bunny", sheets = list(flowers = head(iris))))
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

mick_df <- band_members %>% 
    slice(n = 1)

john_df <- band_members %>% 
    slice(n = 2)

paul_df <- band_members %>% 
    slice(n = 3)

googlesheets4::gs4_create("mick", sheets = list(sname = mick_df))
googlesheets4::gs4_create("john", sheets = list(sname = john_df))
googlesheets4::gs4_create("paul", sheets = list(sname = paul_df))
```


```{r}
mem_list <- band_members %>% 
     rowwise() %>%
     group_map(tibble)

walk(
  mem_list,
  ~ gs4_create(.$name,
    sheets = list(sname = .))
)
```
